revisionDesc.change: removed hard returns within choice tags
extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

body.p: Yours of March 5 recd.received with enc.enclosed —Books will be sent hence by Baldwin's Express (office in London, H. Starr & Co. 22 Moorgate st)—will probably arrive there somewhere ab'tabout 10th or 12th April.

I sent a set ( L of GLeaves of Grass and Two Riv.Rivulets Two Vols.Volumes in one package) to you by mail March 15—& another set two Vols.Volumes same date, to Mrs. G[ilchrist]—but have since learn'dlearned that such packages are overweight, & fear they may not have been forwarded from N. Y.
I wrote you letter March 17—I sent a single Vol.Volume (Two RivRivulets) by mail, March 20—I continue about the same.
